name: zkp-deep-dive
description: demo dApp - making an erc721 app private

scripts.setup: docker-compose run my-dapp npm run setup --
scripts.setup-mimc: docker-compose run my-dapp npm run setup-mimc --
scripts.setupAll: docker-compose run my-dapp npm run setup-all
scripts.setupAll-mimc: docker-compose run my-dapp npm run setup-all-mimc
scripts.fix: npm run format && npm run lint -- --fix
